checkpoints.name: Create commands.json
checkpoints.task_context: Create ryxsurf/configs/commands.json with a list of browser commands including: new_tab, close_tab, reload, go_back, go_forward, toggle_sidebar, summarize_page, hide_popups, switch_session, save_session, open_devtools, toggle_fullscreen. Each command should have description, shortcut, and action fields
